style="display:block">package&nbsp;com.example.myapplication.recyclerView;<br><br>import&nbsp;androidx.annotation.NonNull;<br>import&nbsp;androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;<br>import&nbsp;androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager;<br>import&nbsp;androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;<br><br>import&nbsp;android.graphics.Rect;<br>import&nbsp;android.os.Bundle;<br>import&nbsp;android.view.View;<br>import&nbsp;android.widget.Toast;<br><br>import&nbsp;com.example.myapplication.R;<br><br>public&nbsp;class&nbsp;LinearRecyclerActivity&nbsp;extends&nbsp;AppCompatActivity&nbsp;{<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;private&nbsp;RecyclerView&nbsp;mRvMain;<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;@Override<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;protected&nbsp;void&nbsp;onCreate(Bundle&nbsp;savedInstanceState)&nbsp;{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;setContentView(R.layout.activity_linear_recyctal);<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mRvMain&nbsp;=&nbsp;findViewById(R.id.rv_main);<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mRvMain.setLayoutManager(new&nbsp;LinearLayoutManager(LinearRecyclerActivity.this));<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mRvMain.addItemDecoration(new&nbsp;MyDecoration());<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mRvMain.setAdapter(new&nbsp;LinearAdapter(LinearRecyclerActivity.this,&nbsp;new&nbsp;LinearAdapter.OnItemClickListener(){<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;@Override<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;void&nbsp;onCLick(int&nbsp;position)&nbsp;{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Toast.makeText(LinearRecyclerActivity.this,&nbsp;"click"+position,&nbsp;Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}));<br><br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}<br><br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;class&nbsp;MyDecoration&nbsp;extends&nbsp;RecyclerView.ItemDecoration{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;@Override<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;void&nbsp;getItemOffsets(@NonNull&nbsp;Rect&nbsp;outRect,&nbsp;@NonNull&nbsp;View&nbsp;view,&nbsp;@NonNull&nbsp;RecyclerView&nbsp;parent,&nbsp;@NonNull&nbsp;RecyclerView.State&nbsp;state)&nbsp;{<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;super.getItemOffsets(outRect,&nbsp;view,&nbsp;parent,&nbsp;state);<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;outRect.set(0,0,0,getResources().getDimensionPixelOffset(R.dimen.dividerHeight));<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}<br>}</pre><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""><br>||||
